item.title: For Reduced Exposure to COVID-19, the Quality of Your Internet Matters
item.description: During the height of the COVID-19 pandemic, governments-imposed movement restrictions to curb the spread of the disease. With access to the internet, people could work or study remotely, therefore making it easier for them to adhere to pandemic-related movement restrictions.
